mapper.select: select * from boss_count where user_code=#{user_code} and to_date(attack_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') between to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by to_date(attack_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') asc

select u.user_name user_name,u.user_code user_code, c.round round,c.named named,c.next_time next_time,c.attack_date attack_date from boss_count c,user_table u where u.user_code = c.user_code and to_date(attack_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') between to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by user_name asc,to_date(attack_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') asc
select * from boss_reservation where user_code=#{user_code} and round=#{round} and named=#{named}

select * from boss_reservation where round=#{round} and named=#{named}
order by round asc,named asc,to_date(reserv_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') asc
select * from boss_count where rownum= 1 order by round desc,named desc
mapper.update: update user_table set cp_count=cp_count-1, carry_named=0, carry_time=0, carry=0 where user_code=#{user}
update user_table set cp_count=3, carry_named=0, carry_time=0, carry=0 where user_code=#{user_code}
update user_table set cp_count=cp_count+1, carry_named=0, carry_time=0, carry=0 where user_code=#{user_code}
mapper.delete: delete from boss_count where user_code=#{user_code} and to_date(attack_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') between to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
delete from boss_count where user_code=#{user_code} and named = #{named} and round=#{round} and attack_date =#{attack_date}
delete from boss_reservation where user_code=#{user_code} and round=#{round} and named=#{named} and rownum = 1
